Authorities say blogger photographed Sen. Cochran 's ill wife without permission .

JACKSON - Authorities say a conservative Mississippi blogger went into a nursing home , photographed the bedridden wife of Republican U.S. Sen. Thad Cochran without permission and posted an image online as part of an anti-Cochran video .
